references.paper_title: 4d-fy: Text-to-4D generation using hybrid score distillation sampling
references.reason: This paper is a direct competitor to the proposed method, and its techniques (such as hybrid score distillation sampling) are directly compared against in the paper.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper provides the core image-to-video technology that is a building block for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Objaverse: A universe of annotated 3D objects
references.reason: This paper provides the core 3D dataset that is used for evaluating the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Imagen Video: High definition video generation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper provides the core image-to-video technology that is a building block for the proposed method.
This paper provides the core 3D generation technology that is a building block for the proposed method.
